mapper.select: SELECT s.SECOND_PRECINCT_NO, s.FORECAST_DAY, s.FORECAST_TIME, s.TMP, s.PTY, s.PCP, s.SKY, s.REH FROM ( SELECT t.SECOND_PRECINCT_NO, t.FORECAST_DAY, t.FORECAST_TIME, t.TMP, t.PTY, t.PCP, t.SKY, t.REH, RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY t.SECOND_PRECINCT_NO ORDER BY t.IDX DESC) as rnk FROM SHORT_TERM_FORECAST_TB t WHERE t.SECOND_PRECINCT_NO IN (203, 229, 246, 255, 265, 271, 277, 283, 284, 326, 341, 358, 374, 397, 422, 421, 448, 445) AND TO_DATE(t.FORECAST_DAY, 'YYYYMMDD') <= (SYSDATE + 2) ) s WHERE s.rnk = 1

SELECT s.SECOND_PRECINCT_NO, s.FORECAST_DAY, s.WFAM, s.WFPM, s.TAMIN, s.TAMAX, s.RNSTAM, s.RNSTPM FROM ( SELECT t.SECOND_PRECINCT_NO, t.FORECAST_DAY, t.WFAM, t.WFPM, t.TAMIN, t.TAMAX, t.RNSTAM, t.RNSTPM, RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY t.SECOND_PRECINCT_NO ORDER BY t.ANNOUNCE_DAY DESC) AS rnk FROM MEDIUM_TERM_FORECAST_TB t WHERE t.SECOND_PRECINCT_NO IN (203, 229, 246, 255, 265, 271, 277, 283, 284, 326, 341, 358, 374, 397, 422, 421, 448, 445) AND TO_DATE(t.FORECAST_DAY, 'YYYYMMDD') > (SYSDATE + 2) ) s WHERE s.rnk = 1
